item.title: Earl K. Miller
item.description: Excellent opportunity to join an excellent lab.An NIH-funded appointment is available to study the neurophysiology underlying goal-directed behavior in the laboratory of Dr. Joni Wallis at the University of California, Berkeley.https://neurojobs.sfn.org/job/36633/postdoctoral-position-in-neurophysiology/

item.title: Andrea Junker :verified:
item.description: BREAKING: Hunter Biden made $640 million while “working” in daddy’s administration, and received $2 billion from the people behind 9/11. Now that I got Republicans’ attention. That was actually Jared Kushner and Ivanka Trump.

item.title: Sanjay Srivastava
item.description: “Truth is always a defense to block defamation claims. But the lawsuit can still substantially harm the defendants even if the courts eventually find that they were telling the truth.“‘Realistically, you could wind up going to trial, and even if you’re going to win at trial eventually you’re going to be ruined doing it.’“‘The process,’ he added, ‘is the punishment.’”https://www.vox.com/future-perfect/2023/8/9/23825966/francesca-gino-honesty-research-scientific-fraud-defamation-harvard-university

item.title: Spencer LaVere Smith
item.description: I’m teaching the upper level E&M course next quarter (UCSB ECE)) and the room has a chalkboard, not a whiteboard. I’m mostly doing problem solving during class. I’m trying some premium chalk. Any recommendations?

item.title: Author Sharon E. Cathcart ✅
item.description: Quote from article: If you live in a Blue area of a Red state, get ready: the GOP plans to pull out all the stops for the 2024 election.Double-check your voter registration every month or two, and be sure to double-check it in the weeks just before the deadline for registration, as Republican Secretaries of State prefer to purge people in this window so by the time people discovered they’re purged it’s too late to re-register.Forewarned is forearmed. Pass it on to your friends in Red states.https://open.substack.com/pub/thomhartmann/p/the-shocking-voter-purge-crisis-of-c66?r=1ekuyr&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=email

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: Should journals assure a basic level statistical correctness for the central claims of a paper? Because currently they do not, with the result that the main conclusions are unsupported. Again and again and again.Two examples published this week in journals that really should know better:https://pubpeer.com/publications/92DC27ACDA14118A848849863F24D2https://pubpeer.com/publications/B1314681B75686D59552C160A36B82

item.title: Boris Barbour
item.description: "Biomedical research is a house of cards built upon a foundation of pseudoreplication."Discuss

item.title: Tobias Rose
item.description: …wow. I did not anticipate that posting on the good old neurobio mailing lists would lead to so much instantaneous spam and waves of random out-of-office replies. Mail is really broken.

item.title: Natalie Sedacca
item.description: Weeks of the government screaming that of course the Bibby Stockholm barge is safe and anyone suggesting otherwise is an idiot biased lefty lawyer - then days after the first asylum seekers are moved there they have to be evacuated because of potentially deadly bacteria. Their lives have been uprooted and health put at risk for performative cruelty https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2023/aug/11/legionella-discovery-forces-asylum-seekers-off-bibby-stockholm-just-days-after-arrival#AsylumSeekers #refugees #health #humanrights
